name: Work Hard&Fast
description:
Regular day in your boring life. You have to sort items that are very expensive, so every mistake means end of your employment. You have to work hard&fast to survive in our cruel world!

Yup, that is the story, but it is not completed! I had not enough time to finish this game. Each item in bin with "X" should increase the boss's annoyance. But there is no boss, no progress bar, no feature, so you can only imagine the boss is angry.

Controls:
  • A - first (from left side) blower,
  • S - second blower,
  • D - third blower.
  • SPACE - restart (game over screen)
